AUTHOR: Pwnulatr
INSTALL_MSG:
Successfully installed YouTube Thumbnail Retriever.
Use [p]thumbnail <videourl> to get the thumbnail
NAME: YoutubeThumbnail
SHORT: Gives you a YouTube thumbnail for a supplied link
DESCRIPTION:
Gives you a YouTube thumbnail from a supplied link and caches it on the host's computer for later use.
Will support youtu.be links in the future and more options
